      • processOrders

        public void processOrders(RdpPacket_Localised data,
                 int next_packet,
                 int n_orders)
                   throws OrderException,
                          RdesktopException
        Process a set of orders sent by the server
        Parameters:
        data - Packet packet containing orders
        next_packet - Offset of end of this packet (start of next)
        n_orders - Number of orders sent in this packet
        Throws:
        OrderException
        RdesktopException

      • registerDrawingSurface

        public void registerDrawingSurface(RdesktopJPanel surface)
        Register an RdesktopJPanel with this Orders object. This surface is where all drawing orders will be carried out.
        Parameters:
        surface - Surface to register

      • registerCache

        Set current cache
        Parameters:
        cache - Cache object to set as current global cache
